data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Sacatepéquez.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sacatepéquez, Guatemala

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Sacatepéquez.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Sacatepéquez who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 56,000 souls living in the state of Sacatepéquez with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Sacatepéquez, Guatemala.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Sacatepéquez, Guatemala today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sacatepéquez, Guatemala. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
